services.title: Sketches
services.description: Loose black-and-white or lightly colored sketches. Ideal for quick ideas or early concept exploration.

services.title: Character Design
services.description: Custom characters with optional front/back views, expressions, or outfit variations. Suitable for games, stories, or worldbuilding.

services.title: Full Illustration
services.description: Highly detailed, fully rendered artwork. Includes characters, backgrounds, and lighting — perfect for covers or key scenes.

services.title: Portraits
services.description: Bust or full-body painted portraits in a realistic or stylized aesthetic. Personal, gift, or fantasy-themed options available (and pets, too).

services.title: Advanced lineart & hatching
services.description: Black and white drawings with high detail and complexity. Great for book illustrations, posters, or intricate designs.

services.title: Emotes & Icons
services.description: Custom expressive emotes and profile icons for Twitch, Discord, and social media.

services.title: Other Services
services.description: Video thumbnails, stream overlays, comic pages and other digital art needs. Contact for custom quotes.

sectionData.title: My Services
sectionData.description: Discover my range of professional art services. All commission services include commercial rights and high-resolution files. No NSFW. Prices can be lower or higher if we agree on a particularly simple or complex piece.
